name: Vivi
description:
A project built by DePaul Students under the guidance of Dr Robert Schweizer. This game showcases a player taking care of an injured fox in a rehab center for wild animals.  This game was created by 5 students in around 4 weeks. 

Nick - Producer and Sound Design 

Sean - Animation and Art 

Arturo - Coding 

Leo - Coding 

Jonathan - Design and Sound 

all Sprites in the feeding mini game were provided by google images, outside of those all other assets were created by team members
